question: Can self-funded undergraduate students pay tuition fees in instalments?
answer: Yes, self-funded undergraduate students at the University of Bristol can pay tuition fees in instalments. They can choose to pay in full or set up a direct debit to pay in two instalments on specific dates. The payment plan using direct debit must be set up by the relevant deadline.
